name: YouTube Essential Usability Fixes For 2019
description: Recommended to use together with YouTube Darker Userstyle: https://userstyles.org/styles/159906/youtube-darker-theme-than-stock-complement Essential usability fixes to make it possible to use YouTube in 2019: - Make thumbnails less prominent so they won't take away your attention and it'll be less likely to click on a clickbait video - Highlight channel name and make it bigger - Make video title less prominent and make it smaller - Hide verified account badge on subscription grid - Bring back good old subscribe button a la 2010 - A fresh new logo that more accurately than the official logo represents YouTube's attitude towards the viewers and good content creators (Currently doesn't work very well, please PM me if you know how to fix this)
